title: French annual inflation steady at 1.3% in August - Nasdaq.com
text: PARIS, Sept 12 (Reuters) - French consumer prices rose 0.5% month-on-month in August, giving a year-on-year inflation rate of 1.3%, final EU-harmonised data released on Thursday from the INSEE national statistics office showed.
The 12-month rate was slightly above a flash estimate of 1.2% from INSEE .

Consumer prices rose 0.5% month-on-month, in line with preliminary figures, driven by a rebound in the price of manufactured goods after summer sales. Energy prices were stable in August after falling in July, the data showed.
